Body: Description: We are applying CAP policies on Mac devcies but it's working we have tried different machines but same issue occurs, files attaching not working, kindly help on priority basis.

What We've Learned Updated: Customer have issues with the CAP policies that are not reporting the file transfers.
They have updated agent and applied policy not working but URL block and other policies are working but attachments not working

Next Steps Updated: Gather more details regarding the issue

Request a short video with the issue reproduction.
